ComicInfo.Summary: Tom's accidentally broken the novel Moby-Dick, and he's looking for a way out. What he finds is a path into a whole different ocean, with more trouble (and more whales) than he could possibly imagine. And remember that endless stairway from issue #2? Well, now we get to see what it's for...
ComicInfo.Title: Leviathan 4
